scripts.link-dist: yarn build && cp package.json README.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.publish-dist-dry-run-patch: yarn build && cp package.json README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish-dist-dry-run-minor: yarn build && cp package.json README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.publish-dist-patch: yarn build && cp package.json README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-dist-minor: yarn build && cp package.json README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish
